channel.title: Duel boot android onto iPhone 4
channel.description:
I have an iPhone 4 and want to duel boot android on to it. It's been possible with the older iPhone's but does anybody know how I can do it on my iPhone 4?
I don't really want to jail break my iPhone.
Currently running [b]IOS 6.1.3[/b]

item.title: Duel boot android onto iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:7, topic:533755”]or buy older iphone lel

or if you just like the look of the iPhone, there are knock offs running androids…

such as the goophone?[/quote]

Goo phone is a good suggestion, some of the goophone iPhone clones are skinned like iOS but can easily swap over to a pure android default skin. I have even considered getting the Goophone i5, there are dual and quad core versions.

Read full topic

Guess I’m stuck with the only alternative of actually buying an android device.

item.title: Duel boot android onto iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:2, topic:533755”]http://lifehacker.com/5693309/how-to-install-android-on-an-iphone-in-six-easy-steps

Read through it, you open an app on jailbroken device and it reboots into android[/quote]
Let me make it known now, the openiboot implimentation was never completed. The 3GS, 4, and 4S models never got a bootable version of openiboot. Hell, the 3G never had a finish version of openiboot, but it was made bootable.

Read full topic

item.title: Duel boot android onto iPhone 4
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

[quote=“Muroth, post:2, topic:533755”]http://lifehacker.com/5693309/how-to-install-android-on-an-iphone-in-six-easy-steps

Read through it, you open an app on jailbroken device and it reboots into android[/quote]

Not quiet what I was looking for, thanks anyway.
I really don’t want to jail break. I know it’s possible without jail breaking the iPhone.

Read full topic
